column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A fire in an ambulance broke out at 4.30 pm on October 15
column6: Phnom Penh.------Firefighters managed to put out the blaze by 5:20 p.m.------One person was injured and three hospital ambulances destroyed. The initial reports say that the fire started when an oxygen tank was being replaced inside on of  the ambulances.------More images:------ POST NEWS
